channel.title: Project on Bruce Wu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Bruce Wu's Blog

item.title: Project - Building a small project with AWS
item.description: In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, integrating various cloud services into small projects has become crucial for streamlined and efficient project management.

item.title: Project - Job Scraping and Analysis
item.description: Since I’d like to know the situation of local data-related vacancies in London, England, I have built a job vacancy analysis system, including a distributed crawler with automatic scheduling, a job vacancy analysis dashboard, and a data API.

item.title: Project - ML Model Deployment
item.description: After learning machine learning and data analysis methods, I can’t help but think: what’s next?
